edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class FileImportCell

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.FileImportCell

public class FileImportCell
extends java.lang.Object

These are laid out in a grid on the ImportPanel. They each display a preview of the file, allow the user to add tags, and decide what to do with the underlying file on disk on import.

Field Summary
 CopyStatus copyStatus
          Value determines what the user wants to do with the file.

          The list of tags this file has already been tagged with
